title: Adjective collection 2
sentences: Die Musik ist mir viel zu
The music is much too loud for me.
Can you please speak a bit quieter?
My internet is extremely slow today.
The hotel room was unfortunately very dark.
In der Küche ist es schön
It is nice and bright in the kitchen.
The new car is incredibly expensive.
I am looking for a cheap ticket to Berlin.
Dieses Thema ist für mich sehr
This topic is very important to me.
Did you find the correct address?
I am sure that we will have success.
This intersection is dangerous for cyclists.
That is a very complicated question.
Is it possible to postpone the appointment?
Die Luft hier oben ist sehr
The air up here is very fresh.
I am having a wonderful time on vacation.
The result is completely clear now.
He is a polite young man.
Why are you so impolite today?
The food in the restaurant was greasy.
I am wearing a dry jacket today.
Everything outside is wet from the rain.
He is a very rich man.
dictionary:
laut - loud
leise - quiet
langsam - slow
schnell - fast
dunkel - dark
hell - bright / light
teuer - expensive
billig - cheap
wichtig - important
falsch - wrong
richtig - correct / right
sicher - sure / safe
gefährlich - dangerous
kompliziert - complicated
möglich - possible
frisch - fresh
wunderbar - wonderful
klar - clear
höflich - polite
unhöflich - impolite
fettig - greasy
trocken - dry
nass - wet
wahr - true
reich - rich
